definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
to freeze/to feel very cold/aspic or jelly

sentences.english: Thaw out the frozen meat before cooking.
sentences.chinese: 把冻肉化冻后再进行烹调。

sentences.english: The question and prospect of vitrified cryopreservation on animal tissues and cells are suggested.
sentences.chinese: 并提出了玻璃化冻存动物以及组织细胞的问题与展望。

sentences.english: Cryopreservation can maintain peony pollen viability for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 自来水冲洗化冻能够较高的保持花粉的萌发率。

sentences.english: IQF products, outside is Smooth and brightness, can be quickly thaw, easy for used.
sentences.chinese: 单冻产品，外表光亮，化冻快，食用方便。

sentences.english: Unfrozen calli were then cultured in darkness and grew well with a high survival rate.
sentences.chinese: 化冻后的愈伤组织在黑暗中培养生长较好，存活率高。

definition: to melt/to thaw/to defrost/fig. to relax (repression, enmity etc)
refrigeration/cold storage/to keep (food, medicine) in cold environment
cold water/unboiled water/fig. not yet ready (of plans)
(of plants) to turn green again/to revegetate
to freeze/to feel very cold/aspic or jelly
marinated/to make by pickling, salting or curing
